room_title: Escape room "Chapter 1: The Basement" by The Basement in Los Angeles
room_description: You and your friends have been kidnapped by Edward Tandy - a cannibalistic serial killer with a fine taste for unique electronics, taxidermy, and of course human flesh... He has created a sick and twisted game of sorts in his deceased mother's home. He hopes to weed out the unintelligent and find those who are "worthy of escaping" by his late mother's standards.
